price: Sekiranya Kami hendak membuat sesuatu permainan (istri dan anak), tentulah Kami membuatnya dari sisi Kami 956.  Jika Kami menghendaki berbuat demikian, (tentulah Kami telah melakukannya).
arabic: لَوۡ أَرَدۡنَآ أَن نَّتَّخِذَ لَهۡوٗا لَّٱتَّخَذۡنَٰهُ مِن لَّدُنَّآ إِن كُنَّا فَٰعِلِينَ
footnotes: 956.  Maksud "dari sisi Kami" ialah yang sesuai dengan sifat-sifat Kami.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: law aradnā an nattakhidha lahwan la-ittakhadhnāhu min ladunnā in kunnā fāʿilīna
